Title: Tonight‚Äôs event ‚Äî billed as the -2024 Theodor Herzl Award Dinner-...
Description: Tonight‚Äôs event ‚Äî billed as the -2024 Theodor Herzl Award Dinner- ‚Äî is a tribute to former U.S. ambassador Jon Huntsman, a devout Mormon who is also a genocidal Zionist, and will also honor Tal Huber, the -graphic designer- behind last year‚Äôs KIDNAPPED posters. This is not the first time the museum has lent its space, its tacit support, and its veneer of prestige to individuals and groups that fuel Zionist terror in Palestine. MoMa‚Äôs board of trustees includes Larry Fink, the CEO of Blackrock, an asset management firm with massive investments in companies that supply the Israeli army with equipment; Daniel S. Och, a current member and former chairman of the Birthright Foundation, an organization that sends Jewish youth on free trips to -Israel- to support their indoctrination into Zionism; and Paula Crown, who has stakes in the weapons conglomerate General Dynamics, manufacturer of the MK-84 bombs that the IOF has dropped on Gaza for years.In 2021, @strikemoma laid out the case against the museum: -MoMA was founded with the oil wealth of the Rockefellers. Since then it has been a clearing house for capital, a showcase for domination and an ecocidal machine. It has diversified in content, but in practice has been an enemy of the poor and the marginalized, the fired and the furloughed, the displaced and dispossessed, the detained and the deported, the dying and the dead.-MoMA‚Äôs affiliations show that the museum is more closely aligned with billionaire warmongers than with working artists in New York City. Down with blood money in the arts! Down with Zionism in our institutions! Free Palestine.(2/2)

Title: TODAY! ALL OUT TO MOMA TO PROTEST RONALD S. LAUDER AND THE WORLD ...
Description: TODAY! ALL OUT TO MOMA TO PROTEST RONALD S. LAUDER AND THE WORLD JEWISH CONGRESS. New York City‚Äôs most prominent art institution is allowing genocidaire Ronald S. Lauder to host his Zionist organization‚Äôs annual assembly this evening. A MoMA trustee since 1977, Lauder was the president of the settler-colonial -non-profit- known as the Jewish National Fund from 1997 to 2007, and has since served as Chairman and Chairman Emeritus of its board; he became the president of the rabidly pro-Israel World Jewish Congress in 2007. Because of his extensive political and financial support for Zionist occupation, Lauder's company, Estee Lauder Cosmetics, is a longstanding BDS target. In his speech at last year‚Äôs assembly, Lauder said, -The vast majority of Americans support Israel and stand with the Jewish people,- before quoting former president George W. Bush, whose invasion of Iraq killed over a million Arabs, as saying, -There‚Äôs only one villain in this conflict, and it's not Israel.- (1/2)

Title: ‚ÄºÔ∏èBDS IS THE FLOOR, NOT THE CEILING‚ÄºÔ∏è The student movement for Pa...
Description: ‚ÄºÔ∏èBDS IS THE FLOOR, NOT THE CEILING‚ÄºÔ∏èThe student movement for Palestine must remain steadfast and firm, not only to continue pushing for divestment from genocide in Gaza but to further build power on campus and go beyond the borders of the university and into the community. Nerdeen Kiswani speaks on our community‚Äôs need for bravery and courage in a time where our tuition and tax dollars are funding genocide and the further colonization of Palestine, amidst constant state and university-sanctioned repression. -You can‚Äôt claim to be an ally while you‚Äôre killing us- -Nerdeen Kiswani on the Let‚Äôs Talk Palestine PodcastStudents must be UNRELENTING in the fight for divestment. We will not stop, we will not rest üáµüá∏

Title: For 400 days, Gaza has been on fire, and this fire has not yet be...
Description: For 400 days, Gaza has been on fire, and this fire has not yet been extinguished as the occupation forces continue to bomb every area of the Gaza Strip, resulting in the displacement, hunger, and martyrdom of thousands and thousands of Palestinians. Those who are wounded are left to suffer as oxygen tanks and other medical equipment are no longer functioning in the hospitals of Gaza, making it more difficult to treat patients.Yet despite all of this beign documented day in and day out for the whole world to see, the zionist entity continues its campaign of ethnic cleansing and genocide with impunity. Today in the northern Gaza Strip, occupation forces have yet again committed another massacre after bombing a family home in Jabalia Camp, resulting in over 36 martyrs as seen in this photograph taken today.This massacre was carried out by the zionist entity with US funding and weapons. Let this serve as a reminder that the United States has blood on its hands and that blood will not wash away with a new president in office.(2/2)

Title: Yesterday November 9th 2024 marked 400 days of the ongoing genoci...
Description: Yesterday November 9th 2024 marked 400 days of the ongoing genocide in Gaza and 400 days and 76 years of Palestinian resistance to zionist settler colonialism. In recent days, as fires have raged from New Jersey to Prospect Park, NYC has experienced the worst air quality the city has seen in months, with the city issuing warnings of serious health effects. For New Yorkers who have turned a blind eye to the horrors of the genocide in Gaza, this is not even a taste of what Palestinians in Gaza have been experiencing for over 400 days.One can only imagine what Gaza is going through with constant fires erupting due to the repeated bombings and massacres committed by the zionist entity. This past year we have seen the zionist entity burn down tents, homes, and hospitals, leading to our martyrs being burned alive while the world watches. (1/2)

We demand an immediate end to all military, political, financial, and diplomatic ties to the zionist entity. Our struggle under a Biden-Harris administration is the same under a Trump administration: to organize for an end to the genocide in Gaza and fight for a free Palestine from the river to the sea within our lifetime üáµüá∏

Title: Now, 107 years later, the United States continues to uphold a zio...
Description: Now, 107 years later, the United States continues to uphold a zionist and imperialist agenda in the Middle East. The outcome of the election will not change this course. Our presence in the streets and in our communities will only grow stronger as we remain committed to resisting for Palestine until it is liberated within our lifetime. Take to the streets with WOL this Election Day, Tuesday, November 5th at 7pm in front of NEWSCORP as we demand: NO VOTES FOR GENOCIDE üáµüá∏üáµüá∏üáµüá∏

Title: Last week WOL chair Nerdeen Kiswani joined the Let's Talk Palesti...
Description: Last week WOL chair Nerdeen Kiswani joined the Let's Talk Palestine Podcast to affirm that -We're prepared to fight back regardless of who is in power, I was organizing protests against Trump, I was organizing protests against Obama, was organizing protests against Biden, and I will continue to organize protests and my community moving forward regardless who is in power.- üáµüá∏üáµüá∏üáµüá∏No matter who wins the election, we will keep mobilizing and organizing our communities until there is an end to the genocide and the ongoing Nakba. For over a century, every U.S. President has supported the zionist project, not only in enabling the colonization of Palestine but also in facilitating its ethnic cleansing. As we mark the 107th anniversary of the Balfour Declaration last week, we are reminded that the United States played a key role in bringing this illegitimate declaration to fruition.(1/2)

Title: Last week WOL chair Nerdeen Kiswani joined the Let's Talk Palesti...
Description: Last week WOL chair Nerdeen Kiswani joined the Let's Talk Palestine Podcast to affirm that -what do we believe about voting for the lesser evil is that it paves the way for the greater evil.-As we approach November 5th, we must remember that the US empire is responsible for the genocide in Gaza will remain regardless of who leads it. Whether it be Donald Trump or Kamala Harris, the US will continue to serve as a partner to the zionist entity in the aggression against and genocide of Palestine. Take to the streets with WOL this Election Day, Tuesday, November 5th at 7pm in front of NewsCorp as we demand: NO VOTES FOR GENOCIDE üáµüá∏

Title: Democrat and Republican presidential candidates alike are the fac...
Description: Democrat and Republican presidential candidates alike are the faces of the genocidal imperial U.S. empire. WOL Chair Nerdeen Kiswani joined the Let‚Äôs Talk Palestine Podcast last week to discuss the presidential election. Let it be known that both Harris and Trump intend to continue the genocide in Gaza while continuing to crack down on the movement for Palestine and all peoples' struggles within the belly of the beast. The difference between the two is that Trump remains open and honest about these intentions while the Democratic Party and Harris obscure the truth behind liberal language. Democrats like Harris lie in an attempt to co-opt our movements, using slogans that imply respect for Palestinian life while murdering them and condemning our people's resistance.(1/2)

Title: WOL Chair Nerdeen Kiswani on the Let‚Äôs Talk Palestine Podcast spe...
Description: WOL Chair Nerdeen Kiswani on the Let‚Äôs Talk Palestine Podcast speaks on the upcoming elections.Killer Kamala is not the lesser of two evils. There is no lesser of two evils during a genocide. We will hold war criminals accountable now and not later! -Wouldn‚Äôt it make more sense to hold them accountable while they‚Äôre still relying on your vote?- -Nerdeen KiswaniOn November 5th, this Election Day - NO VOTES FOR GENOCIDE!üáµüá∏üáµüá∏üáµüá∏

Title: WOL Chair Nerdeen Kiswani joined the Let's Talk Palestine podcast...
Description: WOL Chair Nerdeen Kiswani joined the Let's Talk Palestine podcast this week for a conversation on the upcoming US presidential election and the call to refuse to vote for our people's genocide.During the conversation, Nerdeen touches on the contemporary history of bipartisan support for the zionist occupation and colonization of Palestine, the shortcomings of electoral strategy in securing an end to the genocidal aggression of the past year, and the role of the global movement in building power beyond the ballot box.Listen to the full conversation here:https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/lets-talk-palestine/id1687327703?i=1000674708225https://open.spotify.com/episode/33PTHzeJxAuX26Y9mXl27n?si=9nJeFhGcRweufkgCXHYsKA

Title: The crackdown on our constitutionally protected speech is a worri...
Description: The crackdown on our constitutionally protected speech is a worrisome development at any moment in time but in particular right now as social movements confront the US-backed Israeli genocide in Gaza, the Israeli war on Lebanon, and the general global trend toward fascism.Palestinian prisoners are at the heart of the broader struggle for Palestinian national liberation. The use of the law to criminalize and delegitimize freedom fighters from Indigenous, Black, Puerto Rican and other liberation struggles has a long history in this country.AN ATTACK ON ONE IS AN ATTACK ON ALL!You can read the National Lawyers Guild's statement here: https://www.nlg.org/nlg-condemns-the-us-government-attack-on-samidoun/All copy in this post is verbatim from their statement.(2/2)

Title: We join The National Lawyers Guild in Condemning the U.S. Governm...
Description: We join The National Lawyers Guild in Condemning the U.S. Government‚Äôs Attack On Samidoun and the Palestinian solidarity movement.This designation will have a broad chilling effect on Palestine solidarity work in North America. ABOVE ALL, IT IS DESIGNED TO DISRUPT THE UNPRECEDENTED GLOBAL TIDAL WAVE OF SUPPORT FOR THE LIBERATION OF PALESTINE.(1/2)

Title: Yahya Sinwar was a key figure who united the fields against zioni...
Description: Yahya Sinwar was a key figure who united the fields against zionism, to the people of Yemen, he said: -I also extend my salute to the great Yemeni people, who have always stood by our Palestinian people and their just cause throughout history- and in regards to Lebanon and Iraq he said, -The unification of our efforts with you and our brothers in the valiant resistance in Lebanon and the Islamic Resistance in Iraq will break this enemy and bring about its defeat, paving the way for its expulsion from our land.-His legacy will live on in the hearts of every revolutionary. Thousands will rise after him to continue the path towards liberation. The martyrdom of our resistance leaders will not weaken the resolve of the masses, as history has shown that while martyrs leave this world, their ideas remain immortal guiding those after them. These enduring ideas, deeply rooted in the people of Palestine, will drive the struggle forward until the zionist entity is dismantled, in a free Palestine, within our lifetime.(3/3)

Title: Now as the Al-Aqsa Flood battle sparked on October 7, Yahya Sinwa...
Description: Now as the Al-Aqsa Flood battle sparked on October 7, Yahya Sinwar fought to keep his promise to liberate the thousands of Palestinian prisoners who remain in the occupation's dungeons. We remember and honor Yahya Sinwar as a fierce leader who did not waver, but advanced the struggle until his very last breath. In the 2021 war on Gaza, the occupation forces bombed his home in an attempted assassination attempt, but with pride, he returned home, sat on his furniture, and took a picture of himself humiliating the zionist entity. (2/3)

Title: Yahya Sinwar, also known as -Abu Ibrahim-, the leader of the Pale...
Description: Yahya Sinwar, also known as -Abu Ibrahim-, the leader of the Palestinian resistance movement, and the commander fighting alongside his people in Gaza has ascended to martyrdom. Yahya Sinwar was martyred in the heart of Gaza, amongst his people leading them to the front lines. He did not cower away, but instead, he fought, led, and inspired thousands of revolutionaries to stand against genocide, in defense of the honorable Palestinian people. Yahya Ibrahim Hassan Sinwar ascended to martyrdom on the 17th of October, and he was born on the 19th of October in the Khan Younis Refugee Camp as his family was displaced from the city of Majdal Asqalan in 1948 during the ongoing Nakba. It was on the 18th of October, 2011 that Yahya Sinwar was released in the -Wafa al-Ahrar- prisoner exchange deal that liberated 1,027 prisoners held in the occupation's dungeons. (1/3)

Title: Via ANONYMOUS: All out to court for Jordan Neely. October 21st an...

Title: -Child body parts are scattered everywhere..We will witness more ...
Description: -Child body parts are scattered everywhere..We will witness more massacres like this as long as the world leaders sit back and watch.-These are the words of the 174th journalist to be murdered in Gaza, Wafa Aludaini. She was also mother of 3, married, a great friend, and someone who deeply believed in freedom for her people.  We pay tribute to Wafa, we hold her and her martyred family, as we honor all the martyrs of Palestine.  We invite the community to keep this memorial site going, and to confront AOC and all so-called progressive politicians who act as agents of empire.UPDATE: The memorial, which contained mourning art and photos of martyred children contributed by community members AOC represents, was taken down first thing this morning and shoved in the trash by AOC's staff. AOC's office has chosen to erase the memory of Palestinians. She continues to prioritize the imperial interests of Israeli apartheid over the basic Palestinian right to life.(5/5)

Title: Guess what? We don‚Äôt condemn Hamas! We condemn politicians who th...
Description: Guess what? We don‚Äôt condemn Hamas!  We condemn politicians who think they get to play with people‚Äôs lives. We condemn empire, which uses any made up justification at all to drop apartment blocks on people‚Äôs heads to further imperial expansion.-'Israel' made the desert bloom.- Kamala Harris, who AOC campaigns for, recently repeated this racist zionist adage.  A client told a Native comrade the week of indigenous people‚Äôs day: -it was impossible to grow watermelons before -Israel- because it was a desert.-  Zionists really think that there was no agriculture done by indigenous peoples of the entire levant, in the famed -fertile crescent- before they began their campaign to colonize Palestine.  This, while teenagers and children in Gaza are using shards of plastic and wire to construct tiny greenhouses for their seedlings, so that the people around them may have a bite of freshness to keep their spirits strong amidst US-backed forced famine and genocide.(4/5)

Title: AOC ran point on spreading the propaganda that led to this genoci...
Description: AOC ran point on spreading the propaganda that led to this genocide, including signing House Res 966 -condemning rape and sexual violence by Hamas- on October 7th.  That was debunked, but has been weaponized to justify mass lynching of Palestinians ever since.-Hamas is a terrorist organization- Ocasio-Cortez said, as she signed resolution 888 declaring -Israel- a jewish ethnosupremacist homeland. -Hamas are terrorists,- she repeated over and over as she maligned NYC-based Palestinian, Arab and Muslim organizing, where they are targeted/beaten/doxxed/surveilled/threatened with murder‚Äîfor refusing to condemn resistance to colonization by any means necessary. Harris and Biden -are working tirelessly for a ceasefire- she said as they send more than 8.7 billion in September 2024, rounding out an unprecedented year of money to -Israel- in full military support of its genocide (17.9 billion).  (3/5)

Title: COMMUNIQUE: AOC: Ain't Our Comrade Astoria NY: AOC your hands are...
Description: COMMUNIQUE:AOC: Ain't Our ComradeAstoria NY: AOC your hands are red, over 200,000 dead!  We charge you with genocide, and for openly working with genocidal war criminals Butcher Biden and Holocaust Harris.  We are disgusted by your zionism; how you continue to defend -Israel's- right to exist as a settler colony on top of Palestine -as a jewish homeland.- We are a multi ethnic crew including anti zionist jews, and know that anyone who equates jews with -Israel- is not to be trusted. -Israel- is immoral and will be dismantled.  On Wednesday night, a group of actionists gathered outside AOC‚Äôs Astoria office to create an ongoing public memorial site of those lost in -Israel‚Äôs- American-funded genocide of Palestine and invasion of Lebanon, especially highlighting child martyrs. We also redecorated surrounding areas to share the kind of treachery the politician has been involved in.(2/5)

Title: Last night, activists took action to protest AOC at her Astoria o...
Description: Last night, activists took action to protest AOC at her Astoria office by holding a vigil for the martyrs of Palestine after over a year of lies about supporting a ceasefire as she continues to co-opt progressive politics to run cover for Biden, Harris, and the Democratic Party's genocide in Gaza. The memorial featured Shaban Al-Dalou, the young Palestinian who was filmed burning to death after the occupation bombed refugee tents next to Al-Aqsa Martyrs Hospital. AOC has shamelessly already torn down the memorial this morning, hoping to hide the blood on her hands as she desecrates any attempt to honor the over 300k Palestinians murdered with our taxes. We call on all New Yorkers in solidarity with Palestine to continue taking creative action to confront all those complicit and responsible for the annihilation of our people. Read the actionists communique here: (1/5)
